title: Hibike! Euphonium Movie 3: Chikai no Finale
alternative_title: Sound! Euphonium: Our Promise: A Brand New Day, Gekijouban Hibike! Euphonium: Chikai no Finale, Sound! Euphonium: Oath's Finale, 劇場版 響け！ユーフォニアム～誓いのフィナーレ～
description: Hibike! Euphonium Movie: Chikai no Finale will tell the story of Kumiko Oumae and others as second-year students.
